title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button is not aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label, so it cannot contain a mnemonic. Only single selection is allowed, the move up / down feature cannot be applied to more than one item. The signature preview is not wrapping text. The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed, so that the move up / down feature can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview should wrap text and have its background color set to the same color as a hover.
